function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of droplet behavior and propagation in the built environment may lead to incorrect social distancing rules.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to improve understanding of droplet behavior and propagation, and updating social distancing guidelines accordingly.","Technologies":"High-speed photography, computational fluid dynamics simulations.","People":"General public, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on simplified models and assumptions may result in inaccurate assessment of social distancing requirements.","Impact":"Ineffective social distancing measures, leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Utilizing advanced fluid dynamics models to account for complex droplet behavior and interactions in the built environment.","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics simulations, advanced particle tracking techniques.","People":"Public health officials, research scientists.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of sensitivity in experimental methods for capturing all droplets emitted during coughing and sneezing may lead to incomplete understanding of droplet propagation.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of experimental results and inaccurate assessment of social distancing guidelines.","Mitigation":"Improving experimental methods, such as using advanced high-speed photography and particle detection techniques, to capture a wider range of droplet sizes and trajectories.","Technologies":"Advanced high-speed photography, particle detection and tracking systems.","People":"Research scientists, experimentalists.","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories, public health organizations."}]}
